archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: Gochujang-Grilled Tilapia with Pineapple-Jalapeño Salsa, Sesame Cucumber Pickles, and Jasmine Rice
description: Hot, sweet, and smoky tilapia glazed with gochujang, served with bright pineapple-jalapeño salsa, quick sesame cucumber pickles, and fluffy jasmine rice.
prep_steps: Rinse 2 cups jasmine rice under cold water until it runs clear.
Dice 2 cups pineapple, finely chop 1 jalapeno (seeds optional), and finely dice 1/2 red onion.
Thinly slice 1 large cucumber into rounds.
In a bowl, whisk 2 tbsp rice vinegar, 1 tsp sugar, 1/2 tsp salt, and 1 tsp sesame oil for quick pickles.
In another bowl, whisk 2 tbsp gochujang, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp honey, 1 tsp sesame oil, 1 grated garlic clove, juice of 1/2 lime, and 1 tbsp water for the fish glaze.
Pat dry 4 tilapia fillets and brush lightly with canola oil; season both sides with a pinch of salt and black pepper.
Preheat outdoor grill to medium-high (or heat a grill pan on stovetop) and set a saucepan for rice on stovetop.
cook_steps: Cook rice: Add rinsed jasmine rice, 2 1/4 cups water, and a pinch of salt to the saucepan. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 12–15 minutes. Rest covered 5 minutes, then fluff.
Make quick pickles: Toss cucumber with the rice vinegar mixture and set aside, stirring once during resting.
Make salsa: In a bowl, combine pineapple, jalapeno, red onion, half the coriander, a squeeze of lime, and a pinch of salt. Set aside.

Grill fish: Oil grill grates. Place tilapia on the grill, cook 2–3 minutes until opaque at edges. Flip, brush tops with the gochujang glaze, and cook 2–3 minutes more until just cooked through. Brush once more in the last 30 seconds.

Finish and plate: Scatter remaining coriander and 1 tsp sesame seeds over the fish. Serve fillets with jasmine rice, a mound of pineapple-jalapeno salsa, and drained sesame cucumber pickles. Offer extra lime wedges if desired.

ingredients.preparation: 1 tsp for glaze, 1 tsp for pickles
half juiced for glaze, remainder for serving and salsa

final_ingredients.preparation: 1 tsp for glaze, 1 tsp for pickles
half juiced for glaze, remainder for serving and salsa
